learning_outcomes.description: Use modern computing approaches to solve common goals
Communicate complex analyses orally and in writing for a variety of audiences, including scientists, industry representatives, policy makers and the general public
Analytically integrate ecological and genetic data
Write reports that integrate text, code, data, analyses, and graphics using R Markdown
Visualise complex data in creative ways
Produce well-documented R packages and interactive Shiny apps
Learn how to efficiently work in teams to solve coding problems arising in the biological sciences
Conduct reflective self-assessment on achievements and professional development

assessments.task_description: Write a project plan documenting all of the deliverables and subdeliverables of the project. Use a heirarchical structure that fully captures all of the work required to deliver the final output (eg. code, dashboard, tool)
assessments.submission_guidelines: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.deferral_or_extension: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.late_submission: A penalty of 10% of the maximum possible mark will be deducted per 24 hours from time submission is due for up to 7 days. After 7 days, you will receive a mark of 0.
assessments.additional_info: You may be able to apply for an extension.

assessments.task_description: Produce a comprehensive final report fully describing the output delivered. The format will depend upon the nature of the placement and may be, for example, a standard report, or may be a Github page. Agreement between the student, the placement supervisor and the coordinator must be obtained and documented in the Project Plan (assessment 1). All source code must be available for assessment in the project final report, regardless of format. A self-reflective piece of about 2 pages at the end of the report is a requirement for this assessment.
assessments.submission_guidelines: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.deferral_or_extension: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.additional_info: You may be able to apply for an extension.

assessments.task_description: Present the project outcomes in a clear, engaging way, that is accessible to a non-coding audience
assessments.submission_guidelines: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.deferral_or_extension: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.additional_info: You may be able to apply for an extension.

assessments.task_description: A questionnairre will be sent to the project supervisor to record performance and satisfaction.
assessments.submission_guidelines: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.deferral_or_extension: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.additional_info: You may be able to apply for an extension.
